column5: Mermaid Manor, built in the 1880's, is freshly remodeled on the inside. Our elevated 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom home sleeps six. You'll feel cozy and comfy delighting in the treehouse like views. Grab a cup of coffee and hear the ocean from the porch. Relax it's Island time. (If booking for LONESTAR RALLY, we have covered garage parking for motorcycles, up to 6 spaces.)
column8: Sun & Fun Walk 2 Beach Enjoy the Breeze 2bdrm2bath
